title: Kalthondrum Munnamey Lyrics Om Shanthi Om Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Kalthondrum Munnamey Lyrics Om Shanthi Om
Singer(s): Krish
Lyrics: Na Muthukumar

Kalthondrum Munnamey
munn thonriya kaayamthaan
indha kadhal kaayamthaan.

Aann nejam ninaipadhai
pen nenjam ariyumaa
sonnaalum puriyumaa
indha kadhal maayamthaan.

Kadal kaaindhey pogalaam
malai saaindhey pogalaam
nam kadhal niyabagam
adhu endrum oyumaa

Nee ennai piriyalaam
naan unnai piriyalaam
nam nenjin ninaivugal
adhu endrum piriyumaa

Kalthondrum Munnamey
munn thonriya kaayamthaan
indha kadhal kaayamthaan.
